title: Their real faces….
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Dia-san, I’m done cleaning up over here<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you. Without your and Ruby’s help, I wouldn’t have seen an end to this, Riko-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’m glad I can be of help. By the way, where’s Ruby-chan….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ruby is there….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, she fell asleep….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>She was up quite late last night designing outfits, she must’ve been exhausted<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>….Fufu. Ruby-chan, your face looks just like a child<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, truly. I’m about to finish up over here, so please take it easy over there too, Riko-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you for waiting…. Oh my, It seems that Riko-san has fallen for Ruby’s temptation. Fufu, Riko-san, your sleeping face is also that of a child. Let’s let you two sleep for a little bit longer shall we<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
